ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And the earth - We spread it like a carpet and how well We smoothed it out!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We spread the earth a carpet; what comfort We provide!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And the earth – We spread it out, and how well have We smoothed it!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have spread out the earth and how brilliantly it is spread!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We made the earth a base, so how well do We lay out!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We have made the earth a Firash; how excellent spreader (thereof) are We!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the earth, We have made it a wide extent; how well have We then spread (it) out.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And the earth -- We spread it forth; O excellent Smoothers!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the earth have We laid out, how gracious is the Spreader (thereof)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have spread out the earth, how well We have spread it out,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the earth! We have stretched it forth beneath; an excellent Spreader are We!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And We have spread out the earth, so how excellent spreaders We have been!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We have spread out the (spacious) earth: How excellently We do spread out!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We have spread out the earth, how Excellent Spreader (thereof) are We!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and We cradled the earth. And We are the Best of Cradlers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the earth—We spread it out—How well We prepared it!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:48] And the earth, We spread it out: We made it level: what excellent Spreaders then!, We are.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the earth have We laid out) on water, (how gracious was the Spreader (thereof)!
